newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.African average T-Bill rate 14.98 pct.
newsitem.headline: S.African average T-Bill rate 14.98 pct.

text.p: The average discount rate for South African three-month Treasury Bills fell to 14.98 percent after rising to 15.08 percent last week, the Reserve Bank said.
Applications for the 800 million rand of bills on offer totalled 2.031 billion rand. The average price was 96.265 rand percent.

The average rate for six-month bills was 14.27 percent from 14.37 percent. Applications for the 300 million rand of bills on offer totalled 1.175 billion rand. The average price was 92.885 rand percent.
